SELECT
ord.ord_cd "주문 코드", TO_CHAR(ord.req_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "주문일자", TO_CHAR(ord.res_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기일자",
SUM(ordtl.ord_qty) "주문수량", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", cd.cd_explan "진행상황"
FROM ORDERS ord, VENDOR vdr, ORD_DTL ordtl, PROD pd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE ord.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND ord.ord_cd = ordtl.ord_cd AND ordtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND cd.comm_cd = ord.prog_cd AND ord.prog_cd LIKE 'PROG01' GROUP BY ord.ord_cd, ord.req_dt, ord.res_dt, vdr.vdr_nm, cd.cd_explan

SELECT ord.ord_cd "주문코드" , TO_CHAR(ord.req_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "주문일자", TO_CHAR(ord.res_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기일자", ordtl.prod_cd "완제품코드" , ordtl.ord_qty "주문수량", pc.prod_qty "현재고", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", cd.cd_explan "진행상황" FROM ORDERS ord, VENDOR vdr, ORD_DTL ordtl, PROD pd, COMM_CODE cd, PROD_LOT pl, PROD_CURQTY pc
WHERE ord.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND ord.ord_cd = ordtl.ord_cd AND ordtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND cd.comm_cd = ord.prog_cd AND pd.prod_cd = pl.prod_cd AND pl.prod_lot = pc.prod_lot AND ord.ord_cd = #{ordCd}
SELECT PROD_CD "완제품코드", PROD_NM "완제품명" FROM PROD
SELECT PROD_CD "완제품코드", PROD_NM "완제품명" FROM PROD WHERE PROD_CD = #{prodCd}

SELECT pl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", TO_CHAR(pl.pp_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "계획일자", dtl.pd_qty "계획량" FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd

SELECT pl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", TO_CHAR(pl.pp_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "계획일자", dtl.pd_qty "계획량" FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd
AND pl.pp_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", pl.ord_cd "주문코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위" FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd,ORDERS ord WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND pl.ord_cd = ord.ord_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND dtl.pp_cd = #{ppCd}

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수", pl.pp_prog "상태"
FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd,ORDERS ord WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND pl.ord_cd = ord.ord_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd
AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN01'
AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN02'
AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN03'
AND pd.prod_nm = #{prdNm}
AND pl.pp_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY/MM/DD')
SELECT DISTINCT PL.PP_CD "생산계획코드", PL.PP_NM "계획명", TO_CHAR(PL.PP_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') "계획등록일자", CM.CD_NM "상태" FROM PRDT_PL PL, COMM_CODE CM WHERE pl.pp_prog = cm.comm_cd AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN01'

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수"
FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd,ORDERS ord WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND pl.ord_cd = ord.ord_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND dtl.pp_cd = #{ppCd}
SELECT DISTINCT li.line_cd "라인코드" FROM LINE li, PROD pd WHERE li.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND pd.prod_nm = #{prodNm}

SELECT DISTINCT P.PROD_CD "제품코드", B.MT_CD "자재코드", M.MT_NM "자재명", B.CS_QTY "소모량", DTL.PRD_DTLCD "생산지시상세코드" FROM BOM B, MT M, PROD P, LINE LI, PRD_INSDTL DTL WHERE B.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND B.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND P.PROD_CD = DTL.PROD_CD AND LI.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND LI.LINE_CD = #{line}

SELECT DTL.PRD_DTLCD "지시디테일코드", LOT.MT_LOT "자재LOT번호", QTY.MT_QTY "현재고", M.MT_NM "자재명", B.MT_CD "자재코드", TO_CHAR(LOT.MT_EXP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "유통기한" FROM PRD_INSDTL DTL, PROD P, BOM B, MT_LOT LOT, MT_CURQTY QTY, MT M WHERE DTL.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND P.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND B.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND M.MT_CD = LOT.MT_CD AND LOT.MT_LOT = QTY.MT_LOT AND M.MT_CD = #{mtNm} AND DTL.PRD_DTLCD = #{dtlCd}

SELECT DISTINCT ins.ins_cd "생산지시코드", pd.prod_cd "제품코드", pd.prod_nm "제품명", insdtl.ins_qty "생산수량", li.line_cd "라인코드", dtl.pd_rank "지시우선순위", cc.cd_nm "진행구분" FROM prd_ins ins, prod pd, prd_insdtl insdtl, line li, plan_dtl dtl,comm_code cc,PRDT_PL pl WHERE insdtl.insdtl_st = cc.comm_cd AND dtl.pp_cd = ins.pp_cd AND dtl.pd_cd = ins.pd_cd AND insdtl.ins_dtlcd = ins.ins_cd AND pd.prod_cd = insdtl.prod_cd AND pd.prod_cd = li.prod_cd AND pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd
AND cc.comm_cd = 'PRST01'
AND cc.comm_cd = 'PRST02'
AND pl.pp_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY/MM/DD')

select ins.ins_cd "생산지시코드", pd.prod_nm "제품명", insdtl.ins_qty "생산수량", TO_CHAR(insdtl.ins_dtldt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "생산지시일자" from PRD_INS ins, prod pd, PRD_INSDTL insdtl WHERE ins.ins_cd = insdtl.ins_dtlcd AND insdtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd
AND insdtl.ins_dtldt = TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY/MM/DD')

select DISTINCT ins.ins_cd "생산지시코드", insdtl.prd_dtlcd "생산지시상세코드", pd.prod_nm "제품명", pd.prod_cd "제품코드", insdtl.ins_qty "생산수량", li.line_cd "라인코드" from PRD_INS ins, prod pd, PRD_INSDTL insdtl, LINE li WHERE ins.ins_cd = insdtl.ins_dtlcd AND insdtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND li.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND ins.ins_cd = #{dtlCd}

SELECT DISTINCT PRC.PROC_PRCD "진행공정코드", PRC.LINE_TURN "순번", PRC.PROC_CD "공정코드", PC.PROC_NM "공정명", PC.EQ_CD "설비코드", EQ.EQ_NM "설비명", EMP.EMP_NM "담당자", PRC.PROC_QTY "투입량", ST.PROC_PASSQTY "합격량", ERR.ERR_QTY "불량량", ST.PROC_QTY "생산량", TO_CHAR(PRC.PROC_STTM, 'HH24:MI:SS') "작업시작시간", TO_CHAR(PRC.PROC_EDTM, 'HH24:MI:SS') "작업종료시간", CM.CD_NM "상태" FROM PROC_PRC PRC, PROCESS PC, LINE LI, EQ EQ, EMPLOYEE EMP, PROC_ERR ERR, PROC_ST ST, COMM_CODE CM WHERE PRC.PROC_CD = PC.PROC_CD AND PRC.PROC_MGR = EMP.EMP_NO AND LI.PROC_CD = PC.PROC_CD AND PC.EQ_CD = EQ.EQ_CD AND PRC.LINE_TURN = ERR.LINE_TURN AND ST.LINE_TURN = PRC.LINE_TURN AND PRC.PROC_PRCD = ERR.PROC_PRCD AND ST.PROC_PRCD = PRC.PROC_PRCD AND cm.comm_cd = ST.PROC_ST AND LI.LINE_CD = #{line} ORDER BY 1
mapper.update: UPDATE PROC_ST SET PROC_ST = 'PLAN01' WHERE LINE_TURN = #{lineTurn} AND PROC_PRCD = #{procPrcd} AND PROC_ST = 'PLAN00'

SELECT PID.INS_DTLCD AS "생산지시코드", PRC.PROC_PRCD AS "진행공정코드", PROC.PROC_NM AS "공정명", PROC.EQ_CD AS "설비코드", E.EQ_NM AS "설비명", PRC.PROC_QTY AS "투입량", PS.PROC_QTY AS "생산량", PERR.ERR_QTY AS "불량량", PERR.ERR_CD AS "불량코드", ERR.ERR_DTL AS "불량상세", TO_CHAR(PRC.PROC_STTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "공정시작시간", TO_CHAR(PRC.PROC_EDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "공정종료시간", EMP.EMP_NM AS "담당자", TO_CHAR(PID.INS_DTLDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "생산지시일자"
FROM PRD_INSDTL PID, PROC_PRC PRC, PROCESS PROC, EQ E, PROC_ST PS, PROC_ERR PERR, ERR_CODE ERR, EMPLOYEE EMP
WHERE PID.PRD_DTLCD = PRC.PRD_DTLCD AND PRC.PROC_CD = PROC.PROC_CD AND PRC.PROC_MGR = EMP.EMP_NO AND PROC.EQ_CD = E.EQ_CD AND PERR.LINE_TURN = PRC.LINE_TURN AND PERR.PROC_PRCD = PRC.PROC_PRCD AND PS.PROC_PRCD = PRC.PROC_PRCD AND PS.LINE_TURN = PRC.LINE_TURN AND PERR.ERR_CD = ERR.ERR_CD

SELECT PID.INS_DTLCD AS "생산지시코드", PD.PROD_NM AS "제품명", PST.PROC_QTY AS "생산수량", TO_CHAR(PID.INS_DTLDT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "생산지시일자" FROM PRD_INSDTL PID, PROD PD, PROC_ST PST, PROC_PRC PRC WHERE PD.PROD_CD = PID.PROD_CD AND PID.PRD_DTLCD = PRC.PRD_DTLCD AND PST.PROC_PRCD = PRC.PROC_PRCD AND PST.LINE_TURN = PRC.LINE_TURN AND PST.PROC_ST = 'PLAN02'
SELECT proc_cd AS "공정코드", eq_cd AS "설비코드", proc_nm AS "공정명" FROM process
